text:
Dear all,
the first experiment of “Lightsheet bites” has ended, and according to the feedback of speakers and some listeners..it was good!

We didn't find the secret of the Holy Flat Light Sheet..but we got some new ideas to better perform (and enjoy) L-sheet acquisitions, and importantly also met new L-sheet specialists. Number of attendees was quite small (8-20) but this feature makes the meeting more interactive and informal. Questions and discussions were key elements of the meetings.

Do you have any feedback (good and bad things) about your experience in joining the LightSheet bites?

We’d like to discuss more L-sheet topics (and organise more bites..)! If you have any topics that you’d like us to tackle or if you think that you have some skills/knowledge you’d like to share, we are very happy to hear from you! Note: The organising committee will support in any way you need from finding the speaker to organising the Zoom meeting..)

Thanks for having joined the meetings and enjoy the L-sheets!

The WildSheet Lsg-org
